name: .XCZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .XCZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use nsz (multiplatform) or Switch Army Knife (Windows) to convert an XCZ file back into an .XCI file. You can then use the XCI file with custom Switch firmware and Switch emulators as you would normally.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
